name: Spyce Town
description:
This game was developed during Linux Game Jam 2022. It puts them in the position of a person who handles agent/spy requests. Possible tasks include, for example, disabling a camera or downloading files. Each failed task decreases the reputation, once it is at zero you have lost the game.

Team members

  • Graphics: PolaMyu
  • Music and Sound: Morgan  Crow
  • Programming: Ancocodet, angelocali
